alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 3:20AM CDT until July 28 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Whiteside County in northwestern Illinois... Southeastern Carroll County in northwestern Illinois... Southeastern Jackson County in east central Iowa... Northeastern Clinton County in east central Iowa... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 320 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Andover to near Ustick to Carroll County Fairgrounds, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Sterling, Rock Falls, Morrison, Fulton, Prophetstown, Garden Plain, Milledgeville, Preston, Fairhaven, Lyndon, Sabula, Chadwick, Miles, Coleta, Andover, East Clinton, Emerson, Argo Fay and Union Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
